bioconda.name: bioconductor-pqsfinder
bioconda.summary: Identification of potential quadruplex forming sequences

biotools.summary: The main functionality of the this package is to detect DNA sequence patterns that are likely to fold into an intramolecular G-quadruplex (G4). Unlike many other approaches, this package is able to detect sequences responsible for G4s folded from imperfect G-runs containing bulges or mismatches and as such is more sensitive than competing algorithms.

bioschemas.name: pqsfinder
